content: nkf 004 nonsuch knits claire claire is a completely reversible stole using only one pattern row knit wear enjoy materials rowan kidsilk haze 70% super kid mohair 30% silk 229 yds/ 210 m ¾ oz/25g 2 balls shell 650 killer red one size 8 5 0 mm circular knitting needle or size to get gauge darning needle scissors gauge - 4 sts/in garter stitch finished measurements - approximately 63 x 19 stitches and abbreviations used bobble bind off co cast on k - knit p2tog purl 2 together st s stitch es yo yarn over stole pattern repeat of 7 stitches plus 8 loosely co 57 sts use a needle 2 sizes larger if it helps pattern k3 *yo p2tog k5 repeat from * to last 5 sts yo p2tog k3 repeat the pattern row on all sides till the stole is the finished measurement or to desired length leaving approximately 3 yards for the bobble loosely bobble all stitches use a needle 2 sizes larger if it helps weave in all ends copyright 2011 all rights reserved lynn anne banks this pattern is provided for your personal non-commercial use and may be shared as long as this copyright information and credit is included email nonsuchknits@gmail com + + nonsuch knits 2555 s 177th plaza #168 omaha ne 68130
